price: (Bεka kyerεε wͻn) sε: ”Fa Onyankopͻn nkoa no ma me“. Nokorε meyε Ɔsomafoͻ nokwafoͻ ma mo.
arabic: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: an addū ilayya ʿibāda al-lahi innī lakum rasūlun amīnun
